fields.name: drupal_location_id
fields.doc: The library's id as stored in Drupal

fields.name: weekday
fields.doc: Day of the week for which the hours apply

fields.name: regular_open
fields.doc: Opening time (hh:mm) for the library in ET

fields.name: regular_close
fields.doc: Closing time (hh:mm) for the library in ET

fields.name: date_of_change
fields.doc: Date (ISO 8601 date without time in ET) at which the regular hours for the given day changed
